Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.
A list of main networks is shown. The Show Test Networks toggle is shown. The Add Network button is shown.

Preconditions: A custom network should be added first.
Notes: The Delete button is shown IF the network to be deleted is not the currently used network.

Expected result: The network deleted is not shown in the networks list.
